title: windows 10 dc
body: before my computer was windows 7 ive never dc from a game but since i bought the new pc windows 10 ive been getting these atempting 2 reconnect  and i dont think its my pc or internet coz other games work just fine. when i enter a game its says attempting 2 reconect than its good for a bit than some random time i disconect

replies.body: Even though your internet works fine elsewhere, you can still have problems specifically connecting to the game server.  I recommend going over each step in our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to help configure your network and restore a stable connection.  Let me know if you have any questions about this!
